title: "The Cell Phones" by Karen E. Bender
description:
A Rosh Hashanah service is interrupted by voices clamoring for attention. This story appears in the forthcoming collection THE NEW ORDER.


This episode is sponsored by Bona Floor Cleaners (www.bona.com), The Great Courses (www.thegreatcoursesplus.com/LeVar), and the Sierra Club (www.beyondcoal.org/stories).
author: originals+lbr@stitcher.com (LeVar Burton and Stitcher)
